p: To evaluate the effect of sugar content on wing length of female and male Ae. aegypti and Cx. quinquefasciatus we used a generalized linear model for count data on JMP 14 (SAS Institute Inc., NC) ( Dobson and Barnett 2008). For both the hot and cold anthrone tests a Poisson distribution with a log link function was used, with a Maximum Likelihood estimation method. The residuals were used to evaluate normality by Q-Q plots and the Shapiroâ€“Wilk test.
